subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A new rule change eliminated Melky Cabrera’s chances for a batting title, but in the process, Commissioner Bud Selig might have put baseball on a slippery slope that he wisely wanted to avoid.
snippet: A new rule change eliminated Melky Cabrera’s chances for a batting title, but in the process, Commissioner Bud Selig might have put baseball on a slippery slope that he wisely wanted to avoid.
